short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A data wallet & gateway to web3 dApps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Introduction

‚ù§Ô∏è Meteor data wallet is the gateway to web3 personal cloud, which aggregates your dApp interaction data (e.g. click/post/follow) in one place and allows you to monetize data values.

üå± It is built upon Dataverse Kernel, supporting Sign-In-with-Ethereum and Object Capability. Now users can use it as identity authenticator for connecting self-sovereign dApps, controlling encryption keys over data files through decentralized key management and decentralized databases.

long.zh_CN:
Dataverse is your private space for curating multi-media NFTs. It is easier than ever to save and organize authentic contents from various marketplaces. Encrypt your favourite NFTs & collections and explore NFT potentials. 

With just a few clicks, you can create your own identities via wallets like Metamask and save NFTs from several NFT websites, including Opensea, Rarible, Superare, Foundation, Zora, Async Art, Nifty Gateway and more. The SaveNFT button makes it easy to create collections, tag ### and write notes. Flexible encryption options are supported in the browser. 

Dataverse is also your DIGITAL mind. More tool-integrations coming. Easily track NFTs in your private space for better decision-makings. Unleash your creativity and connect with like-minded people. Get started and try it out!
